title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Name The Sound Game + Easy Trivia
itunes:title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Name The Sound Game + Easy Trivia
description:
Lunchbox tries to guess the listener's weight after asking just a few questions. Show members try and name the random sounds. Also, Bobby hosts another round of 'Easy Trivia'.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
